Message.Msg: "T" makes great financial moves ! ! they are a money making machine - not very good on people service. "they should be in banking" ! ! I got out just this year - with a profit - when I was in it for the divy. - why - ? better divy with VOD. but anyway - good luck to T people..

Think about where much of the Fed's direction is coming from: Beltway Cofidential 7/17/2012 "Sen. Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., exhorted Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke to stimulate the economy before November through some form of quantitative easing or other monetary policy, which Bernanke said could create jobs. “Despite two false starts, we’re having a much rougher time than we ever imagined getting unemployment down,” Schumer told the Senate Banking Committee. “So get to work, Mr. Chairman.”" "So get to work" means print more money regardless of not having it.

Message.Title: AHQ (final)...
Message.Msg: ... “In true budo there is no enemy or opponent. True budo is to become one with the universe, not train to become powerful or to throw down some opponent. Rather we train in hopes of being of some use, however small our role may be, in the task of bringing peace to mankind around the world.” – Morihei Uesheba “This is really a lovely horse, and I speak from experience, since I once mounted her mother.” – Ted Walsh, equestrian commentator “To dope the racer is as criminal, as sacrilegious, as trying to imitate God; it is stealing from God the privilege of the spark.” - Roland Barthes “Performing enhancing drugs are banned in the Olympics. Okay, we can swing with that. But performance debilitating drugs should not be banned. Smoke a joint and win the hundred meters, fair play to you. That's pretty d#mn good. Unless someone's dangling a Mars bar off in the distance. - Eddie Izzard "I will enjoy this. I will party. I will drink a lot of champagne." - Christian Olsson of Sweden after winning the men's triple jump. "At the Beijing Olympics in 2008, they handed out 100,000 condoms. This year it's 150,000. That's 100,000 for the U.S. basketball team and 50,000 for everyone else." –Jimmy Kimmel “This is Gregoriava from Bulgaria. I saw her snatch this morning during her warm-up and it was really amazing.” – Commentator on the Bulgarian’s technique in the Snatch weightlifting event. http://media.caglecartoons.com/media/cartoons/100/2012/07/26/115908_600.jpg "Everybody else's family is here, why couldn't I bring my family? - American Beach Volleyball player Misty May, who scattered her dead mother's ashes on court after winning gold. “Have a good weekend, all. Let the games begin!” – echo2165 “May joy and good fellowship reign, and in this manner, may the Olympic Torch pursue its way through ages, increasing friendly understanding among nations, for the good of a humanity always more enthusiastic, more courageous and more pure.” – Pierre de Coubertin http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0pWUwaYER14
You may have to explain the snatch reference to Ricky! LOL
I see you noticed the irony in Schumer's admonishment.

Hey Stevie, don't get your feathers ruffled. If slo-mo doesn't work and you are that adamant about it, go the complaint route or change providers. There's plenty of competition for program services. If the complaint doesn't satisfy you, drop UV and get directv with DVR like I have and you can do slo-mo all you want. I use it from time to time, but it ain't that big a deal. I understand the user guide sez it is there and you expect it, but if it won't work, take your business elsewhere. Nobody's going to fix it for you here. They already told you it isn't available, so deal with it. Maybe the proof reader was supposed to edit it out and didn't. Whatever the reason, you have alternatives. Other than no slo-mo, are you satisfied with UV?

Message.Title: T just went to strong buy on the money flow indicator.
Message.Msg: Try to buy in at 36.25. If it doesnt trade down to there, just buy it. New money is flowing into the shares.
Almost as bad as Mitt the twit.
